jot.physics.particle_system.explosion

Class ParticleExplosion

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.physics.particle_system.explosion.ParticleExplosion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Particle

    public class ParticleExplosion
extends Object
implements Particle
    Class that implements a generic simplistic particle.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

      • ParticleExplosion

        public ParticleExplosion(ArrayList<org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D> vertices,
                         ArrayList<org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D> normals,

                         org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D scaling,
                         float lifeSpan,
                         org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D acc0,
                         org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D vel0,
                         org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D pos0,
                         org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D rot0)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        vertices - the vertices associated to the particle.
        normals - the normals associated to vertices of the particle.
        texCoords - the texture coordinates associated to vertices of the particle.
        scaling - particle scale.
        lifeSpan - particle life span.
        acc0 - particle start acceleration.
        vel0 - particle start velocity.
        pos0 - particle start position.
        rot0 - particle start rotation.

      • update

        public void update(float dt)
        Description copied from interface: Particle
        Update particle acceleration, velocity, position, age, color, size. Depending on the type of update different particle effects are achieved.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Particle
        Parameters:
        dt - simulation time step.
